title: Statement Request
description: Retrieve a summary of account transactions, according to given search criteria

action_type.description: To filter the statement according to the type of transaction.

description.description: If set to 1, will return full contracts description.

limit.description: Maximum number of transactions to receive.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
